// ProjectService - API for projects and warehouse zones
import axios from'axios';const API_BASE=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL?"".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/projects"):'/api/projects';const projectService={async getProjects(){let params=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};try{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const response=await axios.get(API_BASE,{params,headers:token?{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}:undefined});return response.data;}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching projects:',error);const msg=error&&error.response&&error.response.data&&error.response.data.message||error.message||'Loi tai danh sach du an';throw new Error(msg);}},async getZones(projectId){if(!projectId)return{zones:[]};try{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/").concat(projectId,"/zones"),{headers:token?{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}:undefined});const data=response.data;const zones=data&&data.data&&data.data.zones||data.zones||[];return{zones};}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching zones:',error);const msg=error&&error.response&&error.response.data&&error.response.data.message||error.message||'Loi tai danh sach kho';throw new Error(msg);}}};export default projectService;
